knownIssues.summary: When a new picklist value is added to a record type in a scratch org, a subsequent force:source:status or force:source:pull does not grab the changes.
knownIssues.title: New Picklist Values are not retrieved with Record Type with sfdx force:source:pull

knownIssues.summary: Salesforce DX : Custom picklist Values changes on RecordType are deleting the picklist metadata in source file by force:source:pull
knownIssues.title: Custom picklist Values changes on RecordType are deleting the picklist metadata in source file by force:source:pull

knownIssues.summary: Salesforce DX : picklist values on recordType when changes are not being detected by force:source:status and are not pulled by force:source:pull
knownIssues.title: Picklist Values changes on RecordType are not being detected by force:source:status and are not pulled by force:source:pull
